cachedaccounts.askForSecureTokenAuthBypa.title: Ask for Secure Token Auth Bypass
cachedaccounts.askForSecureTokenAuthBypa.description: Hides the authentication UI when a mobile account is created.

cachedaccounts.expiry.delete.disusedSeco.title: Cached Accounts Expiry
cachedaccounts.expiry.delete.disusedSeco.description: Mobile account lifetime before automatic removal in an integer value representing seconds, where -1 means never and 0 means at next login
